short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly translate selected text on web pages. Supports Google Translate API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly translate selected text on any web pages. Supports Google Translate API.

Features:
* Translate the selected content, highlight it and show the translation above
* Double click on the translated word to cancel the translation
* You can customize the translation and use it automatically the next time you look up a word
* Select the source language of the current interface in the bottom right corner
* Easily show and hide the translation interface
* Ability to configure the source language for a specific website
* Ability to configure the language used for translation of a specific language
* If the wrong language was selected before, retranslation requires holding down `cmd/ctrl`
* `cmd/ctrl + click` on the translated word to open custom dictionary

Note: Not all websites have been adapted. If there are websites that need to be dealt with separately, please provide feedback or contact the developer.


------------------------

此翻译插件支持以下功能:

* 翻译选中的内容, 高亮并且在上方显示译文
* 在已翻译的单词上双击取消翻译
* 自定义译文, 下次查词时自动使用
* 右下角选择当前界面的源语言
* 轻松显示和隐藏翻译界面
* 可以配置特定网站的源语言
* 可以配置特定语言的翻译所用语言
* 如果之前选错了语言，重新翻译需要按住`cmd`
* 为某种语言配置词典后按住`cmd(mac)/ctrl(win)`点击已翻译的蓝色部分打开词典


注意: 这是个人开发者的作品, 并未对所有网站做适配, 如果有需要单独处理的网站, 请进行反馈或者联系开发者.
